content: I am a postdoctoral scholar advised by Neal Williams at the University of California, Davis. I am interested in the effects of environmental stressors on native bees. For my dissertation, I focused on nutrition and pesticide exposure and their comparative effects on Osmia lignaria and Bombus vosnesenskii fitness, health, and behavior.

title: Clara Stuligross
